pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Keeper Secrets Manager StorageThe Keeper Secrets Manager Storage module for working with custom key-value storages, creating and managing configuration files. To be used with keeper-secrets-manager-core.For more information see our official documentation page https://docs.keeper.io/secrets-manager/secrets-manager# Change Log## 1.0.1- Added new storage type storage type for AWS Secrets Manager## 1.0.0- Initial release
